section.title: Life Cycle Management Use Case: a Samba Server
section.para: To set up a more robust process for creating, testing, deploying and updating your Samba server installation on CentOS 5 using your samber-server.xml file, you'll do several tasks in this section. First, you'll divide the file into reusable components. You'll also choose appropriate download and storage locations. Then you'll log those files into the versioning system of your choice. The testing process for your distribution definition file has several options, which are covered in the last section.
